name: Bloodbath on a Sunny Day (2016)
description:
‘Bloodbath on a Sunny Day’. uses the tropes of computer gaming, the viewer/player navigates interactively through several vignettes. Scenes reference news stories / terrorist attacks/ 9/11 / mass graves / defecation / sexual acts - whimsical, evil, vulgar and banal events are triggered - and random screenshots produce infinitely unique images that amuse or shock or disgust. 

This project in its various forms - most recently as the ‘Bloodbath v.2’ have included prints, paintings, modular billboards, sculpture, 3D prints, both interactive and non-interactive game engine installations, and numerous virtual models, jpegs, videos and games.
